quiz.text: NESTS has recently released notification for EMRS Staff Selection Exam (ESSE) -2023 for filling up 4062 vacancies.Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to NESTS?1.      NESTS stands for ‘National Education Society for Tribal Students’.2.      NESTS was established in 2018.3.      It has a mandate to manage Eklavya Schools
options: 1 and 3
2 and 3
1 and 2
3 only
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the ______________ has released an amount of Rs. 7,532 crore to 22 State Governments for the respective State Disaster Response Funds (SDRF). The amount has been released as per the recommendations of the _____________.
options: Department of Expenditure, Ministry of Finance; Finance Commission
Ministry of Home Affairs; Finance Commission
Department of Expenditure, Ministry of Finance; Ministry of Home Affairs
Ministry of Home Affairs; Prime Minister’s Office
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to SDRF?1.      The State Disaster Response Fund (SDRF) is constituted under Section 48 (1) (a) of the Disaster Management Act, 2005.2.      The SDRF was formed in accordance with the recommendations of the 12th Finance Commission.3.      Funding to SDRF: 60:40 (Centre: states) for general category states, 90% for special category states and UTs (Northeast and Hilly states/UTs).
options: 1 and 3
1 only
3 only
1 and 2
None of the above

quiz.text: The Action Taken Report (ATR) Module of AuditOnline has recently (July 2023) been launched by the ___________________.
options: Ministry of Home Affairs
Ministry of Panchayati Raj (MoPR)
Ministry of Finance
Ministry of Commerce & Industry
Ministry of Corporate Affairs

quiz.text: As per recent (July 2023) news, the Department of Administrative Reforms and Public Grievances (DARPG) has released the Centralized Public Grievance Redressal and Monitoring System (CPGRAMS) monthly report for June, 2023. New and comprehensive Grievance Redressal Assessment and Index (GRAI) has which of the following dimensions?1.      Efficiency2.      Feedback3.      Domain4.      Organizational Commitment
options: 1 and 3
1, 2 and 3
1, 3 and 4
None of the above
1, 2, 3 and 4

quiz.text: Which of the following is the best performers of Grievance Redressal Assessment and Index (GRAI) – June, 2023 in Group A?
options: NITI Aayog
Department of Public Enterprises
Ministry of Cooperation
None of the above
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to PM-STIAC?1.      Prime Minister’s Science, Technology and Innovation Advisory Council (PM STIAC) have launched nine missions of national importance.2.      It is a 21-member advisory council.3.      It is headed by Minister of Science & Technology.
options: 1 and 2
2 and 3
1 and 3
2 only
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), Union Minister of Commerce & Industry has concluded a highly successful meeting with a delegation from the European Free Trade Association (EFTA). Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to EFTA?1.      EFTA is an intergovernmental organization, created as an alternative trade bloc for those European states that were unable or unwilling to join the European Union (EU).2.      It was established in 1980.3.      It consists of Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, and Switzerland.
options: 2 and 3
2 only
1 and 3
None of the above
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), Prime Minister of India has attended Bastille Day Parade as Guest of Honour at the invitation of H.E. Mr. Emmanuel Macron, President of France, on the Champs-Élysées on 14 July 2023. The Indian Army contingent was led by which of the following regiments?
options: Rajputana Rifles
Punjab Regiment
Madras Regiment
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the Ministry of Road Transport & Highways (MoRTH), with the technical assistance of ________________, has developed five guidelines aimed at enhancing mountainous road infrastructure in India.
options: Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA)
Asian Development Bank
World Bank
Larsen & Toubro
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the 50th meeting of the Goods and Services Tax (GST) Council has been held, under the chairpersonship of the Union Finance Minister. As per the recommendations in the meeting, Casino, Horse Racing and Online gaming to be taxed at the uniform rate of _______ on full face value.
options: 5%
12%
18%
28%
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), Third G20 Culture Working Group (CWG) meet has been held at which of the following places?
options: Panaji, Goa
Hampi, Karnataka
Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh
Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh
Chennai, Tamil Nadu

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the Ministry of Coal has set a target to achieve coal gasification of __________ coal by _________ reflecting the government’s commitment to harnessing the power of coal gasification.
options: 50 Million Tonne (MT); FY 2030
200 Million Tonne (MT); FY 2030
100 Million Tonne (MT); FY 2025
100 Million Tonne (MT); FY 2030
100 Million Tonne (MT); FY 2027

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), UN has introduced 51 robots at AI summit to advance Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to SDGs? 1.   SDGs comprises of 17 goals and 169 targets. 2.   India’s performance towards SDG is evaluated based on National Indicator Framework (NIF). 3.   NIF is developed by Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation.
options: 2 only
1 only
2 and 3
None of the above
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), International Maritime Organization (IMO) has adopted revised strategy to reduce greenhouse gas emissions from international shipping. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to key features of new strategy?1.      An enhanced common ambition to reach net-zero GHG emissions from international shipping close to 2050.2.      A commitment to ensure an uptake of alternative zero and near-zero GHG fuels by 2030.3.      To reduce the total annual GHG by at least 70%, striving for 80%, by 2040, compared to 2008.
options: 1 and 2
3 only
2 only
2 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: As per recent (July 2023) news, time period for submission of PAN-linked bank account details of the person seeking registration with tax authorities has been reduced from ______ to _________.
options: 45 days; 15 days
30 days; 15 days
45 days; 30 days
45 days; 15 days
None of the above

quiz.text: Schedule M has been in news recently (July 2023), it is a standard that ________ manufacturers must adhere to.
options: automobile
steel
consumer goods
pharmaceutical
None of the above
